page.description: Allows you to specify the formatting of a button's label when the button has focus.

argument.name: {I= N }
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. Sequence number of image previously specified by a %I= Image_Name % directive. Inserted at any position.

page.discussion: The OF directive allows you to specify the formatting of a button's label when the button has focus. Normally, it would be paired with a O directive, which defines the button's label when the button does not have focus. When you have multiple directives in a Format string, you separate them with semi-colons ";".
